law.catch_line: Amendment of articles of incorporation -- Stock insurers.

text.section: A domestic stock insurer may amend its articles of incorporation for any lawful purpose through the same procedures prescribed in KRS Chapter 271B.

Quadruplicate originals of articles of amendment shall be delivered to the commissioner, shall be subject to examination and certification by the Attorney General, to approval by the commissioner, and to filing, all as provided for original articles of incorporation under KRS 304.24-040.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1326, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 162, effective July 1, 1972. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 24, sec. 9, effective June 18, 1970.

metadata.lrc-note: .As of January 1, 1989, KRS Ch. 271A becomes KRS Ch. 271B. Therefore, the reference in subsection (1) of this section to KRS Ch. 271A has been changed to KRS Ch. 271B.
